text: Altınyazı is a village in Turkey. It is in the Kırşehir Province. The population is around 220. The village was founded about 2000 years ago. The old name of Altınyazı was Aflak, after an old Seljukid general who died here. Category:Villages in Turkey Category:Central Anatolia Region
title: Altınyazı, Mucur
